QuestData.Title: The King's Gambit
QuestData.Description:
Atal'Dazar is the tomb of kings. MY kings. My greatest followers.
I will taste Zul's flesh before this day is done.
Come, $p, keep up. Our prey has neither the strength nor the numbers to block this entrance. Let us crush this heretic.
QuestData.LogDescription: Join Rezan and Rastakhan in their siege of Atal'Dazar.
